item.title: Molecule
item.description: Good ansible roles test themselves using Ansible Molecule. Molecule itself provides support for testing multiple instances, i.e. OS versions. It can be integrated with GitHub Actions and provides a good way of automated testing of your new roles. Getting started You can take the geekoops-nginx project as a template or follow the description below. For the GeekOops project, we typically use docker containers with systemd to test the roles on. Test runs can be executed on your local computer by running molecule test.
